Description: Book of the Dead of Khary Wesay; frame 7; coloured vignettes.
Curator's comments: Nicholson and Shaw, Ancient Egyptian Materials and Technology (Cambridge 2000), p. 114, 116. Tarasenko, Mykola. 2016. Studies on the vignettes from chapter 17 of the Book of the Dead. I, The image of mś.w Bdšt in ancient Egyptian mythology (Archaeopress Egyptology 16), Oxford, p. 91.
